other_tests.findings: Sinus tachycardia initially, with new ST depressions noted in inferior leads (V3, V4) during observation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progression from sinus tachycardia to new ST depressions.

other_tests.findings: Liver appears echogenic, compatible with diffuse fatty infiltration. No focal intrahepatic lesions, normal gallbladder with a 3-mm polyp at the fundus, and no evidence of stones or hydronephrosis in the kidneys.
